div.p:
Be It kend tile ale men be thir present lettres ws Aldirman bailyeis consaile and communite
of abirdene our awaile in that part considerit ande vndirstandin to haue set and to formaile
lattin ande be thir present lettres settis to formaile lattis tile our hertlie louet nychtbour
alexander menyeis ale ande haile our Smale custumes of the saide burgh with thar'
pertinence for ale the termes of tene yeris for ane certane' Some vsuale money of
scotland' in formaile for the saide tene yeris pait to ws in nowmerit money
in tyme of the making of thir present lettres til ane propyne to be gevin tile
our souerane lord in his first cuming tile the saide burgh Of the quhilk Some'
ande formaile for the saide tene yeris we hald' ws weile content ande
fullelie pait and' dischargis ande quiet'clamys the saide alexander his aieris
executouris and assignez' for ws our successouris ayris executouris and assignez' now ande
for euir To be haldin and hed ale ande haile the saide smale custumez'
with thar pertinence aucht and wont to the said alexander his aieris and assignez' quhilk
salbe of nay gretar degre thane him self with ale and sindrie fredomes' commodites
asiamentis and proffitis pertening or richuislie may pertene tharto The Entre of the said'
alexander salbe in and witht the forsaide smale custumez' the day of the making'
of thir lettres Ande frathinfurtht to continew in peciabile' Josin and breuking'
the samyn quhil ale the termes of tene yeris haile and to giddir be fullelie
complet ande runnyn but ony Interruption' or brek of termes or yeris
Impediment or demand' to be maide in the contrar' ale fraude and
gile awayput And' gif thar beis ony merchandis complanteous'
apone the saide alexander his aieris or assignez' of resone anent the saide
custumes It salbe referrit to the aldirman ande consale for the tyme
without preiudice of this assedacione' And' we the sadez' aldirman bailyeis
Counsaile and communite sale warand' kep ande defend' the said' smale
custumes with thar pertinence aucht and wont siclik as the forsaid Alexander Josit
thame obefor to the saidez' alexander his aieris ande assignez' for ale the termes
of x yeris In maner and forme as said' Is be ale our landis and gudis aganis
ale deidlie ale fraud and gile away put In witnessing of the quhilk
our commone' Seile is hungyne to thir lettres at Abirdene the Sext day
of September the yer of god jM iiiiC and nynty yeris

Vniuersis pateat per presentes nos prepositus balliuos consules et communitatem
burgi de abirdene vnanimi consensu et assensu vtilitate nostra in hac parte
vndique pensata fecisse constituisse et ordinasse necnon tenor'
presencium facere constituere et ordinare nostros dilectos conburgenses Robertum
blinsel Johannem Cullan alexandrum Rede Johannem Colisone et thomam
prat nostros legittimos commissarios ac deputatos speciales dan' et conceden'
eisdem nostram liberam et ammodam presentatem Irreouacabilem ac mandatam speciale
pro nobis et nomine nostro totas et Integras nostras paruas Custumas
cum suis Justis pertinenciis assedare et ad firmam dimittere honorabili viro Alexandro
menyeis nostro conburgensi predilecto pro terminis trium annorum immediate post terminem
sue assedacionis prius desuper fact' complendorum Et generaliter omnia alia singula
faciend' gerend' et excercend' quo in premissis et circa ea necessaria
fuerint seu oportuna promitten' nos Rato grato firmum et stabile
haben' et habiturus tocium et quicquid dicti commissarij nostri in premissis duxerint
faciend' sub ypotheca et obligacione omnium bonorum nostrorum mobilium et immobilium
presencium et futurorum In cuius Rei testimonium Sigillum nostri communione presentibus est
appensum Apud Abirdene xxo die mensis Julij anno Domini Mo cccco nonagesimo
octauo

We balyeis Counsal and communite of Abirdene grantis vs avand to
our Richt hertlie louet nychtbour' sere Jonhne ruthirfurd knicht threttene
pundis and tene pennis vsual money of Scotland lent to vs in
novmerit money in our gret neid' in tym of the makin' of thir lettres for the quhilkis we
haue grantit and assignit and be thir present lettres grantis and assignis to
the said' knicht his ayris executouris and assignez' our lauchful assignais in
that part Sex pundis tene s' and v d' to be rasit at his or thar
avne handis of the maile of ony half nethis fischingis of
the Raik that plesis him of the next fischingis in the yer of god
jM iiijC nyntj and nyn yeris Ande vthir sex li' of the male of
ane demi nethis fisching in the yer thareftir follouing in the yer of god jM
and fiwe hundreth yeris Ande gif neid' be the tennentis of the saide
fischingis for' the sade threttie li' and tene d' and thar gudis to compell
and distrenye at his or thar avne handis but le ony leif of vs And'
we the saidez balyeis Consal and communite oblis' vs our successoris
ayris executouris and assignez' to warand kep and defend this our assignacion
to the said knicht his ayris executouris and assignez' as said is be al our
landis and gudis aganis al dedlie In witnesing of the quhilkis
we haue appensit our common' seil to thir lettres at Abirdene the
xx day of Julij the yer of god jM iiijC nyntj and aucht
yeris

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem penultimo
die mensis Julij anno quo Supra

The saide day thomas prat Come Souerte to Williame of
murray for Ranald' Chene for auchtene stanez' of woll
to be pait at the next beltane hereftir follouing

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
vltimo die Julij quo supra

the saide day comperit margeret burnat the Relict of vmquhill
Johne blakhall of bourty and ratifeit and appreuit the assidacion'
and takis maid be hir' to William blakhall of hal the landis of
westerhous' the quartar of the myle of bourty pertening to hir' in lyfrent
and of al hir' terce of the landis of the burroche of bourty mekile
fymersy litile fymersy the myl of fymersy manetht and Certeson'
and the balyeis mad tharupon' and suer' the gret aithe to obserue ale
pontis contenit in tham Ande Alexander burnat hir' fadir promittit be the fath
of his bodie to gif to the said' William the obligacion that Jhon blak hale
his fadir mad' to him Anent the varandice of hir' coniunctfeftment vndir
the pane of tua hundreth merkis for the quhilkis the said Willam
Remittit him xl s' of mariage gudis And' atour he Reuocit and annullit al
lettres maid' betuix him and his douchtir and the said' William John executis the chartir and letter
Sesin of the half landis wister
hous'

div.head: the aldirman and the consale

head.add: the Consal promittit to pay the aldirman the siluer that he gevis for the tone

div.p:
The iij day of August the yer forsaid' the consal present
for the tyme promittit to pay the aldirman the siluer that
he deliuerit at thar commavnd' in thar materis and erandis
quhen he gevis in his writ of his deliuerance

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem sexto
die Augusti quo Supra

the saide day Dauid adamsone comperit and schew how
he was warnit be the officiar' to comper this day to
ansuer' at the Instance of patrik adamsone offering
him redy to do that accordit him and to deliuer him his chartiris
quhilkis he brocht with him and the said patrik comperit nocht to follow
him herfor he protestit to be quyt of his challance quhil
he be warnit with new soit

the saide day comperit William chamer and mathow branche offering
tham redy to ansuer' to Elizibeth' setone and becaus' scho comperit
nocht thai protestit to be quyt of hir challance quhil thai wer'
new warnit

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvijo die
augusti quo supra

The saide day the balyeis assignit this day xv dais to John
Wilson' wobstar to entir Jonhne balfour' befor the balyeis to ansuer'
to megy hill for' viij s' and a siluer Ring and gif he falyeis tharintill
to ansuer' for the sade Johne to the said megy

the saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit this day xv dais to Androw lammynton'
to ansuer' to the borghe' strekit one him for the haldin of tua li' g' fra William
blinsell

The saide day Isabell Cullane was conuikit be ane suorne
assis' Jonhne Ratre forspekar for the done castyne of Alexander
chameris dyk for the quhilkis scho was in ane amerciament of
the court and to amend' as law wile and forber' in tym to cum

head.add: the copy of the kingis letter

div.p:
James be the grace of god king of Scottis Til ale and
Sindrie our officiaris liegis and subditis quhome it efferis
quhais knavlege thir our lettres salcum greting forsamekile as
our vthiris lettres war direkit obefor' be avis' and deliuerance
of the lordis of our consale chargeing for certan resonabile
causis concerning the gude of merchandice and common wel of our
realme that nay Schipis suld' pas' nor' saile in merchandice
furtht of our realme in ony partis within the duk of burgunyeis
land' for ane certan tyme to Cum lik as our vthiris lettres and
proclamacion maid' tharapon' proportis Neuirtheles' becaus' we knaw
that ane Schip of the tone of Wer' in zeland' the mastir ande
Skippar tharof Callit neilboll was ladyne and chargit with merchandice
and gudis of our merchandis of abirdene and vthiris our liegis befor the making
of the saide proclamacion and was redy to haue departit and gif scho war'
Stopit of hir viage it suld' be gret skathis bath to the skiparis and
merchandice herfor of our Speciale fauoris we gif and grantis ful licence
and fredome be thir our lettres to the saide skippar and merchandis to pas' quhen
it plesis tham with the said Schip and merchandice and gudis to the campver'
or ony vthir partis beyond' sey that plesis tham for the excerceinge of thar
merchandice and wil that thai be nocht accusit attachit arrestit or trubulit
tharfor in thar personis Schip merchandis or gudis be vs or ony of our officiaris
liegis or Subditis in onyvis' nocht withstanding ony proclamacion
Inhibicion lettres of or chargis of ouris in the contrar' anent the quhilkis
we dispens' with the said Skippar and merchandis be thir our lettres
quharfor we charge stratlie and commandis yow al and Sindrie our
officiaris liegis and subditis forsaidis that nayne of yow tak apon hande
to do or attampe ony thingis in contrar' this our licence and dispen
sacion in onyvis' in tyme to Cum vndir al the hieast pane and charge
that eftir may follou gevin vndir our priue seile at Stirueling'
the xix day of August Ande of our Regne the xj yeris

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvij die
Augusti quo Supra

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Jonhne
of Cullane forspekar that Jonhne lundoris is aving to Neilboll
viij s' g' x g' And Androw litstar xiiij s' Scottis money
for wast fraucht Ande Jonhne Arthour' iij s' g'

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vltimo die
augusti

The saide day William blinsel tuk to preiwe one monunday
that next cumis befor the balyeis that Androw lammyntone is
avand' to him ij li' g'

The saide day Androw Steuart and his wif was conuikit be
ane Suorne assis' Jonhne Colisone forspekar for strubulance
of maly seruand' to Johne of meldrum and scho quyt of thar al
strubulance

the saide day Williame Wormet deliuerit to Thome
Waus ane obligacion of j barrel Salmond' or j dakir of
hidis maid' to mery obery franchman and dischargit the
said thomas tharof In the name of the said franchman

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem tercio die
Septembris quo Supra

The saide day Thomas mar' fand ane borghe in the hande
of Androw nachtj that Alexander chamer in the schipraw wranguislie
and agan the law annaleit the stanys out of the grond aving
to Sanct Katrinis chapell and him annual et cetera and requirit the balyeis
til arrest the said stanis quhil it war decidit

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane assis' Johne
mar' forspekar that Jonhne pet has releuit Jonhne Wobstar
of the viij s' aucht to Dauid beuerlay be the said Dauidis
avne gravnt and vthiris preuis led tharupon' for the quhilkis
viij s' the said Johne Wobstar was borghe to the said
Dauid for Jonhne of balfour'

The saide day Thomas strathachin and his mayt Induellaris
of montros' deponit the gret bodelie that thai saw ane
francheman callit collin perkat draw wyne out
of ane pip of claret wyne pertening to William
Richerdsone and merkit with his merk out of thar boyt
of montros'

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem sexto die
Septembris quo Supra

The saide day Jonhne elliot franchman grantit that he hede
resavit fra sere Jonhne ruthirfurd' aldirman of this burghe fiwe barrelis of Salmond'
in tharof j barrel fra Androw Cullane yongar j barrel fra Rich William
harpar and iij barrelis fra Richerd ruthirfurd his brothir out of his sellar'
Ande j barrel of Salmond' and xx sous' in Deip fra Johne of
Ratre for the clathis befor mastir Jasper Cranestone' parsone of fethir
essey mastir Jhon' lindsay Alexander menyes Alexander Rede sere
Androu chamer and William Richerdsone

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem Septimo
die Septembris quo Supra

The saide day comperit Jonhne Scheual opidane and mer
chand' of Dep and grantit him to haue resavit be the handis
Elizibeth' Wormet the relict of vmquhil Robert of cullane
ful and haill pament of tene frankis quhilkis he deliuerit to
Adam of Cullan In the name of the said Robert and of al vthiris
Somes of money and gudis and of al contrakis and merchandis maid'
betuix him and vmquhil the said Robert ande dischargit
and quiet'clamit the said Elizibeth' the ayris executouris and assignais
of the said Robert for him his ayris executouris and assignais now and
foreuire

The saide day Jonhne Scheual opidane of Deip grantit hm resavit
ful pament of Sex barrellis pipis of wad' be the handis of
Johne of Cullan and quiet'clamit' him his ayris executouris and assignez' now and
foreuir

the saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Johne
of Cullane forspekar that Johne elliot sal mak ane bill of
covnt and Rekning to Alexander chamer of the gudis clamit be him
agan monunday that next cumis quhilk bil he wil mak
gude fath is leill and trew

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xijo die
septembris quo Supra

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
Williame futhes forspekar that meg' cadiow the videw
of Jonhne fechat was in ane amerciament of the court for the
strubulance of Williame gray and to Amend as law wile et cetera
quhilkis Amendis the assis' referrit to the aldirman and consale
and the said' William quyt of al strubulance of the said' woman

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvijo
die mensis Septembris

the saide day it was preuit befor the aldirman and balyeis that Androu
lammyntone sal pay to patrik andirsone xxx d' Ilkan ouk
for his sellar' maile salang as the saide Androw occupeit it

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xix die septembris
quo Supra

the saide day Jonhne elliotis franchman with Jonhne mar' his forspekar
deliuerit ane bill of compt and rekning betuix him and Sandy chamer
and offerit him redy to do that he suld' do of resone to the said Sandris

The saide day sere Androw chamer in the name of the said Sandris
chamer of his brothir allegit the saide day was nocht assignit to his said
brothir and his day bigan and he nocht warnit tharto protestand solemptlie
that quhat beis done turne nocht to his brothir to preiudice nor skathis

The saide day the balyeis ordanit ane officiar' to warne Johne
elliot and Sandris chamer to comper perempturlie to morne befor
tham to do that accordis Ilkan till vthiris

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xx die mensis
Septembris quo Supra

The saide day thir personis eftir follouing that is to say gilbert menyis
James Colisone Androw Cullane yongar Thomas mar'
William portar and William portar Wormet was chosin be the haill
merchandmen of the toune and suorne the gret aithez tile
extent and set be thar' conscience xlv li' scottis money
to thar part of the Some of iiijC li' divisit ymange
the commissaris of burrouis to the expens' of ane
ambassat to pas' for the gude of merchandice to the
Archduk of Austrie and burgunye for the distruction
of the lettres of marque et cetera rasit or to be distro rasit

The saide day the bailyheis chargit It was deliuerit be ane suorne'
assis' gill William blinseile forspeker' that Jonhne stevinsone sall
content ande pay to malcum of crage five barellis of meill quhilkis
the bailyheis chargit to pay within terme of law ande William gareaucht
skipper sall fre the saide Jonhne stevinsone of the said v barellis
within terme of law and pay the samyn
The saide

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio
eiusdem vicesimo secundo die Septembris quo supra

The saide the aldirman and bailyeis assignit mononday that
nixt cumis to Jonhne Elleot that he sall suer' that the bill of
Rekning that he present In Jugment the saide Is leill and trew And'
gif it happinnis the saide Jonhne to pas' or monnonday that
that he sall his aitht that that bill is leill and trew and he aucht
hyme na mar' thane that bill proportis

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxviijo
die Septembris quo Supra

The said day Walter strachin lauchfullie callit and nocht comperit to ansuer' entir
to the borghe strekit strekin one him be Jonhne annand' for the
wranguis' haldin fra him of jc futuale and x mar' comperit nocht tharfor
the balyeis chargit Androw nachtj officiar' to pas' and tak ane distres
fra the said' Walter and lat it agan to borghe and it be askit and warne
him to entir the said thomas one monunday that next cumis to
ansuer' to the said' borghe as secunde day of proces'

The saide day Jonhne blak Cordonar was conuikit be ane suorne
assis' alexander rede forspekar for strubulance of m mathow massy
and to Amend' as law wil and forber' in tym to Cum And atour
the said Jonhne was conuikit for' common' strubulance for the quhilkis
It was ordanit and deliuerit be the aldirman ande Consal that the
said Jonhne suld' be put and Sett in the goyf be his feit thar
to Reman quhil he war' borrouit be the mastir of the scoule
And' gif euir the saide Jonhne happinnis to committ ony falt
strubulance or violence to the said mastir / or mathow or tile
ony persone within this tovne and beis conuikit tharof salbe
expellit and forbiding the towne foreuire et cetera
